root.name: The Sims 3: DIESEL Stuff
root.description: OverviewThe Sims 3: DIESEL Stuff is a Sims 3 expansion pack developed by The Sims Studio and published by EA Games for the PC and Mac platforms.System RequirementsPC System RequirementsMinimum:Processor:Pentium 4 @ 2 GHz/Athlon XP 2000+Memory/RAM:1 GB (1.5 GB for Laptops and Windows Vista)Video Card:128 MB (GeForce FX 5900/Radeon 9500)Hard Disk Space: 6.5 GB of hard drive space with more room for additional contentOperating System:Windows XP (with Service Pack 2) or Windows VistaRecommended:Processor:Pentium 4 @ 2 GHz/Athlon XP 2000+Memory/RAM:2 GB (4 GB for Laptops and Windows Vista)Video Card:256 MB (GeForce 9400GT/ATI RADEON HD 3600 Series)Hard Disk Space: 7 GB of hard drive space with more room for additional contentOperating System:Windows XP (with Service Pack 2) or Windows VistaMac System RequirementsMAC OS X 10.5.8System RAM 2 GBDrive Space 135 MBVideo RAM 128 MBVideo (ATI) ATI Radeon X1600Video (NVIDIA) NVIDIA GeForce Go 7300Video (INTEL) Intel GMA X3100
